name: Huntington 100
brief: Inducted in the 2023 Huntington 100 which honors outstanding students for achievements which are commensurate with the university’s mission, ideals, values, and Academic Plan

name: Undergraduate Community Service Award
brief: Sole recipient of the 2023 Khoury Undegraduate Community Service award recognizing a student's achievements in contributing to the Khoury community

name: OSEAI Student Leader Spotlight Award
brief: Selected for the OSEAI Student Leader Spotlight Award, which recognizes D’Amore-McKim student leaders, nominated by their peers, who have demonstrated outstanding leadership and have made significant contributions to their business oriented club/organization community during the 2022-2023 academic year
